request.payloadData: {"fields":{"id":{"en-US":1},"postDate":{"en-US":"2025-07-16T18:35:12Z"},"title":{"en-US":"How a Creative Studio Can Transform Your Brand Story"},"author":{"en-US":[{"sys":{"type":"Link","linkType":"Entry","id":"author-team-journeywell"}}]},"category":{"en-US":[{"sys":{"type":"Link","linkType":"Entry","id":"category-storytelling"}},{"sys":{"type":"Link","linkType":"Entry","id":"category-brand-development"}}]},"industry":{"en-US":[{"sys":{"type":"Link","linkType":"Entry","id":"industry-creative-services"}},{"sys":{"type":"Link","linkType":"Entry","id":"industry-small-business"}}]},"post":{"en-US":{"nodeType":"document","data":{},"content":[{"nodeType":"paragraph","content":[{"nodeType":"text","value":"Your brand is more than a logo—it's the story you tell. At JourneyWell, we help small businesses and creative professionals build a visual identity that connects. As a full-service creative studio in Baton Rouge, we bring clarity, storytelling, and strategy into every project. Whether you're launching a new brand or refreshing an old one, our media services—from video to podcasting—are designed to align your vision with visuals that move people. Discover how purpose-driven storytelling can position your business for growth.","marks":[],"data":{}}],"data":{}}]}}}}
